programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dr Huhana Hickey is a key figure in the disability community. She's organising a hikoi to seek a better future for the next generation - and marking her life story with a moko kauae.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Canada Remembers Our Heroes
programme.desc:
Service and Sacrifice relates the stories of humble and heroic Second World War Veterans Henry Beaudry, who helped liberate Europe and escaped from a POW camp.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Evening the Odds
programme.desc:
Evening the Odds is a documentary on gender equity in sport, with a specific look at the situation within para sport in Canada. We talk with researchers to learn what needs to be done to make sport a level playing field for all genders.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Ça me regarde
programme.desc:
(S09EP32) Pour le 40ème anniversaire de la Fondation MIRA on parle de sa mission permettant d'améliorer la vie des personnes aveugles. On s'entretient avec notre chroniqueur littéraire M. Cousineau.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
Hit the mat in Montreal with Canadian Para Judo star Priscilla Gagné. Then, Greg Westlake visits Holland Bloorview Kids Rehabilitation Hospital in Toronto to witness how they use sport as a tool in recovery.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Mind Set Go
programme.desc:
Melanie loves teaching others how to tap into the healing properties of crystals, but her own health reflects bad habits picked up in her 20s.
Année : 2011

programme.title: #IGotThis

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc:

Année : 2011
